user_input:
Modify the DHEM model.
  o Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
  o Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
  o Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous step
  o Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations based on the user's request and the DHEM model specifications.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to modify the data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level, select the appropriate file and modification context.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario object called 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to add a new scenario, select the appropriate object context for scenario creation.

tasks.description: For each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class, add a max flow property using the data file and scenario created in the previous steps.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to add a max flow property, select the appropriate objects and apply the new property details.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' and assign the clone the name 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to clone the model, select the appropriate model to clone and apply the naming convention for the new model.

tasks.description: Add the new scenario to the cloned model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request to add the new scenario to the cloned model, select the appropriate model and scenario relationship.
